definition: Ziyun Hmong and Buyei autonomous county in Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: But Ziyun hadn't come back, which worried the family very much.
sentences.chinese: 可是紫雲一直沒回來，家裏人着急不已。

sentences.english: Segmentstion is characteristic in the Ziyun deformation zone.
sentences.chinese: 紫雲變形帶上的分段運動特點十分顯著。

sentences.english: Late Carboniferous phylloid algal reefs developed on the carbonate platform margin in Ziyun County, Guizhou (South China).
sentences.chinese: 紫雲晚石炭世葉狀藻礁發育在碳酸鹽臺地邊緣。

sentences.english: Getting to know a little, instead of going back to the school, he took Ziyun home.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解情況後，他沒有回學校，直接送紫雲回家。

sentences.english: Effect of winter sown Chinese vetch on soil enzyme activity in calcarious dirt soil is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究在石灰性爛田中冬種紫雲英對土壤酶活性的效應。

sentences.english: Up to the evening, did Ziyun go back home, with her English teacher in the junior high school.
sentences.chinese: 直到晚上，紫雲纔回到家，由她的英語老師陪着。

sentences.english: "Violet marble " action is: Astonish, calm the nerves .
sentences.chinese: “紫雲石”用作藥材，它的作用是什麼？

sentences.english: Purple cloud wonderland lies in the Limu Village Etang Town Hezhou City.
sentences.chinese: 紫雲景區位於廣西賀州市八步區鵝塘鎮慄木村。

sentences.english: Ziyun, at that time, felt warmer than ever, even to an extent of sadness.
sentences.chinese: 紫雲的心情此時感到無比的溫暖，甚至有一點酸楚。

orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
Dongshan county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian/Tungshan township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
to chat with a low voice
jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
